com.plexobject.bus

Interface EventBus

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EventBusImpl

    public interface EventBus
    This class defines interface for intra-process communication via messaging

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void publish(java.lang.String channel, Request req)
      This method sends given event to all subscribers on the channel (based on their filtering)
      long subscribe(java.lang.String channel, RequestHandler handler, Predicate<Request> filter)
      This method subscribes event handler to given channel and will notify when an event is received on the channel that meets filter
      boolean unsubscribe(long subscriptionId)
      This method unsubscriber with given id

    • Method Detail

      • subscribe

        long subscribe(java.lang.String channel,
             RequestHandler handler,
             Predicate<Request> filter)
        This method subscribes event handler to given channel and will notify when an event is received on the channel that meets filter
        Parameters:
        channel - - name of channel
        handler - - of event
        filter - optional parameter for filtering
        Returns:
        - subscription-id used for unsubscribing

      • unsubscribe

        boolean unsubscribe(long subscriptionId)
        This method unsubscriber with given id
        Parameters:
        subscriptionId -
        Returns:
        true if subscription was found and false if not found

      • publish

        void publish(java.lang.String channel,
           Request req)
        This method sends given event to all subscribers on the channel (based on their filtering)
        Parameters:
        channel - - where event will be published
        req - - Request
